sentence.idiomatic: He is the youngest in our class.
When you're feeling down going traveling is considered a pretty good option.
What must one do to be considered a good boss?
There isn't anything special about this design.
This is our specialty dish.
There is something distinctive about his voice.
The past few years they have built a lot of new houses there.
Is your family's house built yet?
When you're finished drinking don't forget to put the lid back on.
This program is lacking features of the local culture.
Although foreign things are pretty good, I still prefer things of a more local flavor.
With respect to pricing, there is a definite difference between foreign brands and local brands.
Don't try to explain. Basically, it's you that is wrong.
Regardless of who sings it, I just don't like it.
I can't really remember how to do it. Anyway, it's just a pain.
This poem, when read aloud, is full of feeling.
These houses look almost the same; there is nothing special feeling about them.
I have a good feeling about him, he is a boy with a very sunny disposition.
We're on the way to the hotel now.
There are lots of motorcycles in Hanoi. You could say it's a characteristic of the place.
Oh, there's a street restaurant here. Business is good. Are they selling beef pho?
These past few years Vietnam has developed quickly. They've built a lot of skyscrapers.
But there are still a lot of old houses in the city, some of them colonial style, others local style.
Classical mixed with modern, the east combined with the west; anyway, Hanoi is so atmospheric.
I hear that Hanoi also has lots of rivers. How come I haven't seen a single one yet?
The driver said we are almost at Ho Chi Minh's grave. Too bad it's hard to see at night.
Let's come back tomorrow!
